About

Hello. I'm Chris.

I am a design technologist in Amsterdam. I work across research, design, and development. I have a background in human-computer interaction and architecture. Feel free to reach out to discuss a topic, collaborate, or for a coffee. Learn more →

Write

Thoughts about technology, society, and everyday design.

Essayd and articles are being reformatted. There'll be more to come.

Highlight

Voice Interfaces and Shopping

The futuristic world where we can shop through our voice assistants has been slow to arrive. What fundamental limitations of voice interfaces as a medium hold back their potential for voice shopping?
